data.title: Jim Coutinho at Allen Stovall Neuman & Ashton LLP
data.meta_description: Jim Coutinho specializes in delivering expert legal advice for complex cases. Find out how his expertise can benefit you at Allen Stovall Neuman & Ashton LLP.
data.text:
EDUCATION

Law School:

Capital University Law School, J.D., 2007

Cum Laude, Order of the Curia (National Legal Honor Society)

College:

The Ohio State University, 2004

B.A., Economics

COURT ADMISSIONS

2007, Ohio

2008, U.S. District Court, Southern District of Ohio

2014, U.S. District Court, Northern District of Ohio

2008, U.S. Court of Appeals, Sixth Circuit

ASSOCIATIONS

Ohio State Bar Association

American Bankruptcy Institute

National Association of Bankruptcy Trustees

Practice Areas

Business Bankruptcy, Debtor/Creditor Rights, and Workouts

Receiverships

Real Estate & Commercial Leasing

Litigation & Alternative Dispute Resolution

Notable Accomplishments

Member of the Independent Panel of Chapter 7 Bankruptcy Trustees, Columbus, OH

Member of the Independent Panel of Chapter 11, Subchapter V Bankruptcy Trustees, Southern District of Ohio

Named as a SuperLawyer for 2022 (the first year eligible), 2023 & 2024

Named as a SuperLawyer Rising Star for 2017 through 2021

Selected for National Conference of Bankruptcy Judges “NextGen” program, 2014

Attorney Advisory Committee, United States Bankruptcy Court, Southern District of Ohio – Chapter 11 Subcommittee, 2017-2024

Columbus Bankruptcy Pro Bono Project, 2012-2024

Columbus Bankruptcy Judicial Liaison Committee, Member 2019-2012, Chair 2013-2014

Columbus Bar Association, President’s Award, 2014

Eagle Scout, 1995

Speaker:

Guest Lecturer, Finance/Econ Undergrad & Graduate Courses on Bankruptcy & Restructuring, The Ohio State University Fisher College of Business, 2022-2024.

“Chapter 7 Trustee Panel, Exemptions & Business Cases,” Credit Education Coalition Fall Seminar 2023.

“Subchapter V Trustee Panel,” Southern District of Ohio Bench Bar Conference 2023.

Guest Speaker on Importance of Pro Bono Work, Bankruptcy Pro Bono Project Fresh Start Gala, 2023

“Receiverships,” Ohio State Bar Association Business Law Institute 2023.

“Title Issues in Bankruptcy,” Westcor Land Title Insurance Company Seminar 2022.

“Receiverships: Another tool for the insolvency attorney,” Credit Education Coalition Winter Seminar 2021.

“Business Law Update: COVID-19 and Small Business Bankruptcy,” Ohio Bar Association, 2020.

“Mortgage Lien Avoidance Update,” Bankruptcy Bench Bar Conference, 2019.

“Attorney Advisory Committee – Chapter 11 Subcommittee Update,” Bankruptcy Law Institute, Columbus Bar Association, 2019.

“Interplay Between Bankruptcy and Receivership Laws,”Bankruptcy Law Institute, Columbus Bar Association, 2016.

“Perspectives on Professionalism,” Bankruptcy Law Institute, Columbus Bar Association, 2015.

“Local and National Case Law Update,” Bankruptcy Law Institute, Columbus Bar Association, 2014.

“Unbundling Legal Services in Consumer Cases,” Columbus Bar Association Bankruptcy Committee, 2014.Keynote Address, Bankruptcy CLE, Legal Aid Society of Columbus, 2013.

“Local Case Law Update,” Bankruptcy Law Institute, Columbus Bar Association, 2013.

“Mortgage Avoidance Update,” Chapter 7 Trustee Training, Southern District of Ohio, 2012.

“Setting a Course to Avoid Liens,” Southern District of Ohio Bankruptcy Bench-Bar Conference, 2012.

“Revisiting Stern v. Marshall,” Eighth Annual Mid-Atlantic Bankruptcy Workshop, American Bankruptcy Institute, 2012.

“Stern v. Marshall,” Bankruptcy Law Institute, Columbus Bar Association, 2012.

“Local Case Law Update,” Bankruptcy Law Institute, Columbus Bar Association, 2012.

“Burning Down the House: Fallout from Mortgage Avoidance Cases,” Credit Education Coalition Fall Seminar, 2011.

“Stern v. Marshall,” Columbus Bar Association Bankruptcy Committee, 2011.

“Local Case Law Update,” Bankruptcy Law Institute, Columbus Bar Association, 2011.

“Bankruptcy Litigation Procedure and Nuances” & “Adversary Proceedings – Discovery, Evidence, Settlements,” National Business Institute, 2011.

“Basic Finances,” Volunteers of America, Veteran Alumni Employment Program, 2011.

“Local Case Law Update,” Bankruptcy Law Institute, Columbus Bar Association, 2010.
